body.name: Apicizon 10 Tiers Shoe Rack, 50 Pairs Shoe Storage Organizer, Non-Woven Fabric Metal Shoe Shelf Tower, Shoe Rack Organizer for Closet/Entryway/Garage, Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 53 mins
features: MAXIMIZE SPACE: 10 tiers shoe rack can hold 50 pairs shoes to help you maximize the space. Amazing size of 39.3”L x 11”W x 68.7”H. This modern shoe rack will keep your entryway, closet or garage from mess.
FIT HIGH BOOTS: The height of each shelf is 7", fit for high heels and ankle boots. You can remove a layer to fit boots, high heels without bending the shoe's back.

FLEXIBLE COMBINATION: To meet various storage needs, you can separate it into different tiers of storage racks. One 10-tier shoe rack can be customized into three lower shoe racks, such as 2-tier, 3-tier and 5-tier.
MATERIAL & STRUCTURE: waterproof fabric tiers, durable iron pipes and tight plastic connectors makes it sturdy enough to hold all of your shoes. It is a light weight but strong shelving option.
1-YEAR AFTER SERVICE: If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase for any reason, please reach out and we will attempt to resolve any issues and ensure your contentment.
body.description: Product Description:The proper organization of things weighs much in our daily life, it has effect on the quality of circumstance and living space. This 10 Tiers Shoe Rack make your space well organized in an orderly way. Shoe wearing is made with metal pipes, non-woven fabrics tiers and plastic connectors, durable and clean easily. Also as a detachable shoe rack, you can separate it into different tiers of storage racks. One 10-tier shoe rack can be customized into three lower shoe racks, such as 2-tier, 3-tier and 5-tier.Specification:- COLOR: Black / Grey / Brown- LAYER HEIGHT: 7”H- WEIGHT: 6.4 LBS- PRODUCT SIZE: 39.3”L x 11”W x 68.7”H- MATERIAL: Metal Pipes, Non-woven Fabrics Tiers, Plastic Connectors Package Contents: - 1 x 10-Tier Shoe Rack- 1 x Instruction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it but cant put heavy shoes
reviews.reviewText: Got many compliments on it but I feel like it may rip when I put heavy shoes on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely holds a lot of shoes
reviews.reviewText: This is decent quality and it holds a lot of shoes. I use it for my daughter's shoes and got over 50 pairs on it. Easy enough to assemble, once you got the hang of it. You had to make sure that the rods were the correct ones, which was hard to determine based on the vague instructions that were provided. But, once I played around with it, I figured out what needed to be done and then had no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, fabric base, light weight but works well and awesome for the price point
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was easy but I had to redo a couple of times because the plastic joints have to be done a certain way and it can be confusing sometimes. Was surprised to find out the material was fabric at the base holding the shoes. I guess I didn’t pay attention. I assumed it was metal or plastic as the fabric does look like metal in pictures. But I guess for the price, it works. Lastly more importantly, I figured out a new configuration that would allow me to use all 10 bases for shoes without giving up one base to house tall boots. The instructions tells you to skip a base to allow for more room for tall boots. Well, what I did was I used the longer metal rod for one of the bases instead of the shorter one that we are supposed to use. That allowed me to get more space for tall boots and still use all 10 bases. It’s kinda hard to explain but my picture shows the configuration I used. I used the longer rod at the bottom hence my boots fit there. I ended up with a ton of extra parts since I did not follow instructions but it worked out for me. You can see all the extra parts in the second picture.All this headache could have been avoided if the manufacturer included 2 more joints. Then I wouldn’t have had to improvise and do my configuration. But it all worked out. I feel like a genius for solving this puzzle. Oh and the metal rods can bend easily in the middle. I tried in assembling a rod and forced it a bit too hard from the joint and it bent. So go easy on these things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage piece
reviews.reviewText: Relatively sturdy. Sinks a little in the middle if you have some heavy shoes like sneakers, but it has held up well and keeps shoes organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I never thought I had so many shoes in all those boxes I had.
reviews.reviewText: I did not believe how many shoes I had until I started to fill up Apicizon 10 Tiers Shoe Rack. I have over 50 pairs of shoes, slippers, sandals, and boots. I even threw worn-out shoes I had for years. At least I can find my shoes easily instead of looking through all the boxes to find what I wanted to wear that day. It makes my getting dressed so much easier to get the right shoe to wear that day. It took me a while to put it all together but it was worth the time. The shoe racks I have had before could only keep a few pairs on them and they never looked organized. Apicizon Shoe Rack was well wort the time to put it together and now I can find my shoe in seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is cool looking but cannot handle any weight. If you have anything other than flip-flops, you’re in trouble. The worst part was that I did not save the box that it came in and it’s so big, no box fit it. Couldn’t ship it back to Amazon. Total loss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es amplio y cómodo
reviews.reviewText: Al fin puedo ver casi todos mis zapatos en un solo lugar, esta bastante amplio, caben bien casi todos los tamaños. Li recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bought four of these in total over the last year. The two that I bought most recently have collapsed and broke. At first, they seem very durable and nice but if you are planning to put multiple shoes that have any weight like gym shoes or boots, it will probably wear out soon. I’m really sad because I’ve just wasted my money and I now have to be on the search for a way to store all my shoes again.
Buen producto, práctico , de buen material y presentación adecuada para el vestidor.
El producto cumple su función, está lindo y fácil de armarse. Gracias.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy frágil para los 50 pares que anuncia que le caben
reviews.reviewText: En la descripción del producto dice que le caben 50 pares de zapatos pero al ponerle esa cantidad se vence y no soporta el peso, deberían de hacerlo de mas calidad y mas resistente, no lo recomiendo
